questions.text: I have enough spiritual strength that I can help others fight their battles without being pulled down myself.
questions.principle: Spiritual surplus enables ministry to others

questions.text: I have built up enough resistance to temptation that I'm not constantly in survival mode spiritually.
My spiritual health is robust enough to absorb setbacks without crisis — I have margin.
I have accumulated enough victory over specific sins that I can mentor others facing the same battles.
My spiritual immune system is strong — exposure to darkness doesn't destabilize me the way it once did.
questions.principle: Spiritual strength develops through tested exposure
